io.spine.server.rejection

Interface RejectionReactor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventProducer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggregate, AggregatePart, ProcessManager

    public interface RejectionReactor
extends EventProducer
    A rejection reactor declares methods that receive rejections and may generate events in response.

    This means that a reactor does not have to always generate an event.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.spine.server.EventProducer

        getProducerId, getVersion
